abstract: Judge George A OToole Jr sets June 24 as day for official sentencing of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev in Boston Marathon bombing case; jury has recommended death penalty.
lead_paragraph: The judge in the Boston Marathon bombing case set June 24 as the date he will formally sentence Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the convicted bomber, to death.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Sentencing Date Is Set for Boston Bomber
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Sentencing Date for Boston Bomber

snippet: The judge in the Boston Marathon bombing case set June 24 as the date he will formally sentence Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the convicted bomber, to death.
